sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce mois-ci, je suis très occupé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am very busy this month.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān fēng hěn dà, bié chūqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de vent aujourd'hui, ne sors pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The wind is strong today, don't go out.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez vous asseoir, commençons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sit down, let's begin.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À demain !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: See you tomorrow!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de háizi zài xiǎoxué dúshū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon enfant étudie à l'école primaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My child studies at elementary school.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons manger ensemble.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go eat together.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 别人的东西不能随便拿。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Biéren de dōngxi bù néng suíbiàn ná.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On ne peut pas prendre les affaires des autres sans permission.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You cannot take other people's things without permission.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette femme est médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That woman is a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en train de regarder la télévision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is watching TV.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de shūbāo lǐ yǒu hěn duō shū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de livres dans mon sac d'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many books in my school bag.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中国是一个很大的国家。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó shì yī gè hěn dà de guójiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine est un très grand pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China is a very large country.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ sòng nǐ yī fèn shēngrì lǐwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je t'offre un cadeau d'anniversaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I give you a birthday gift.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxiào lí wǒ jiā hěn yuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'école est très loin de chez moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The school is very far from my home.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Excusez-moi, comment aller à la gare ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Excuse me, how do I get to the train station?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À qui est ce sac ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Whose bag is this?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelles couleurs aimes-tu ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Which colors do you like?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux apprendre à conduire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to learn to drive.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elles sont mes amies.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They are my friends.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ceci est mon livre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is my book.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō shù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup d'arbres dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many trees in the park.
